thoughts.text: I need to start by conducting thorough market research to identify potential customers and target markets for fulldome.pro dome theaters. I should also collaborate with the fulldome.pro team to stay up-to-date on product features and benefits, as well as industry trends and best practices. Once I have a better understanding of the market, I can develop and implement a comprehensive sales strategy that includes lead generation, prospecting, and nurturing to maximize sales opportunities. I should also continuously analyze and optimize the sales process to improve efficiency and effectiveness, including identifying and addressing any potential roadblocks or challenges.

thoughts.plan:
- Conduct thorough market research to identify potential customers and target markets
- Collaborate with the fulldome.pro team to stay up-to-date on product features and benefits, as well as industry trends and best practices
- Develop and implement a comprehensive sales strategy that includes lead generation, prospecting, and nurturing to maximize sales opportunities
- Continuously analyze and optimize the sales process to improve efficiency and effectiveness, including identifying and addressing any potential roadblocks or challenges
